name: reactotron
description: A console-based remote control for React and React Native.

scripts.dist:
npm run clean && mkdir bin && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node
' > ./bin/reactotron.js && gulp build && cat dist/index.js >> ./bin/reactotron.js
scripts.cpdistc: rm examples/ReactDomExample/client.js && cp dist/client.js examples/ReactDomExample/ && rm examples/ReactNativeExample/client.js && cp dist/client.js examples/ReactNativeExample/ && rm examples/ReactNativeWebExample/client.js && cp dist/client.js examples/ReactNativeWebExample/
scripts.cprawc: rm examples/ReactDomExample/client.js && cp client/client.js examples/ReactDomExample/ && rm examples/ReactNativeExample/client.js && cp client/client.js examples/ReactNativeExample/ && rm examples/ReactNativeWebExample/client.js && cp client/client.js examples/ReactNativeWebExample/
scripts.build:minor: npm run dist && xyz -i minor -s bump_client.sh
scripts.build:patch: npm run dist && xyz -i patch -s bump_client.sh
